name: dzo

screenshots.caption: Simple application to laborate with dzo.
Servlet to undeploy, compare database and deploy application
Opening dialog when executing dzo:s jar-file.

short_description: The goal with dzo is to treat a application database objects the same way the application's source code is treated, with respect to development, revision control, and deployment. Dzo currently works with MySQL, Oracle, and SQL Server (more to come).
